title: How to unsubscribe from Ipsy
description: Ipsy is a beauty subscription service that sends its members a box of makeup and skincare products each month. If you no longer wish to receive these boxes, you can cancel your subscription through the Ipsy website.

web.title: Cancel Ipsy Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Ipsy subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   Log in to your Ipsy account on the Ipsy website.
*   Go to 'Account'.
*   Find the active subscription you wish to cancel and click 'View Membership'.
*   Select 'Cancel Membership' to begin the cancellation process.
*   Verify your account information if prompted.
*   Click 'Continue Cancellation' to finalize the process.
*   Ensure you cancel by 11:59 PM PT on the 25th of the month to avoid being charged for the next month's box.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Ipsy subscription. Follow these simple steps to unsubscribe from Ipsy and stop future charges. This guide provides clear instructions for canceling your Ipsy Glam Bag, BoxyCharm, or Icon Box membership.
